alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:15PM CDT until June 17 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... East central Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 515 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Adams, or 21 miles east of Guymon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Baker, Adams, Boyd, Mocane, Turpin and Floris. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
